programme.title: The Ashes Live
programme.desc: Australia v England. Coverage of the second day of the First Test in the five-match series, which takes place at Optus Stadium in Perth. programme.title: The Breakdown
programme.desc: Ally McCoist, Owen Hargreaves, Joe Cole and Joleon Lescott discuss Man City's improvement, Arsenal's title credentials, Liverpool's struggles, and more.

programme.title: Live Premier League
programme.desc: Burnley v Chelsea (Kick-off 12.30pm). Coverage of the top-flight match from Turf Moor. The hosts will be looking to end their miserable run against Chelsea having not beaten the London club in 11 meetings. In that run the Clarets have only managed to pick up three points from a possible 33 against their visitors, a run that stretches back to a 3-2 victory in August 2017.

programme.title: Live: Quilter Nations Series
programme.desc: Wales v New Zealand (Kick-off 3.10pm). Coverage of the match from the fourth round of fixtures, which takes place at Principality Stadium. The hosts have a wretched record against their visitors and haven't beaten them since 1953, a run that stretches back 33 matches. The last meeting between the two sides was in November 2022, with New Zealand hammering Wales 55-23 in that fixture.

programme.title: Live: Quilter Nations Series
programme.desc: Ireland v South Africa (Kick-off 5.40pm). Coverage of the match from the fourth round of fixtures, which takes place at Aviva Stadium in Dublin. The hosts have had the better of this fixture in recent years, winning four of the last five meetings between the two sides. The last time these teams met in July 2024 saw Ireland win a thrilling match 25-24 in Durban.

programme.title: 2025 Grey Cup
programme.desc: The Alouettes and Roughriders duel in the 112th Grey Cup. Both teams needed semifinal heroics, with Tommy Nield's touchdown catch with 12 seconds left getting Saskatchewan by BC 24-21, while Montreal upset Hamilton 19-16 on a last-second field goal.

programme.title: The Grizzlie Truth
programme.desc: Superfan filmmaker Kat Jayme investigates the abrupt move of her NBA hometown team, the Vancouver Grizzlies, to Memphis in 2001. Much more than a sore spot, it's an unsolved mystery and possibly a criminal conspiracy. The investigation becomes a love letter to the worst professional sports franchise in history and an exploration into the deep roots of fandom.

programme.title: Live: College GameDay
programme.desc: Originating from the site of one of the day's best matchups, with a sea of fans cheering wildly in the background, host Rece Davis and analysts Lee Corso, Kirk Herbstreit and Desmond Howard talk college football for three hours, reporting on the top teams, games, players and storylines. David Pollack and Maria Taylor contribute reports, interviews and features. Davis replaced longtime host Chris F

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Sooners take on the Tigers. Oklahoma leads the all-time rivalry series 67-25-5, but Missouri won the first meeting as SEC equals in 2024. Oklahoma has defeated then-No. 14 Tennessee and then-No. 4 Alabama on the road in November.

programme.title: Live: College Football
programme.desc: The Longhorns (7-3, 4-2 SEC) line up against the Razorbacks (2-8, 0-6). Texas picked up a 20-10 decision at Arkansas in 2024, but fell 35-10 at then-No. 5 Georgia on Nov. 15 to end a four-game winning run. The Razorbacks have dropped eight in a row.

programme.title: Live: College Football Scoreboard

programme.title: Live: TNF Tonight
programme.desc: Analysis of tonight's matchup and latest news from around the league.

programme.title: Live: NFL Football
programme.desc: The Bills face the Texans. Buffalo seeks its first victory in Houston since 2006, a run of five losses that includes a playoff defeat in 2020. Ka'imi Fairbairn's 59-yard field goal as time expired gave Houston a 23-20 win over Buffalo last season.

programme.desc: The debate is the story in this fast-paced, half-hour series hosted by former Washington Post sportswriters Tony Kornheiser and Michael Wilbon. programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: While the investigation of a corrections officer accused of assaulting female inmates deepens, the union backing the accused man takes action that threatens the lives of the SVU team members.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: When Carisi's sister's fianc falls back into bad habits and accuses his parole officer of rape, Carisi must investigate.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: Barba's efforts to make an arrest in a case involving pornographic photos is stalled when several suspects come down with the measles; Amaro receives distressing news about his son.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: An investigation into the sexual exploitation of Catholic schoolgirls results in charges against judges, legislators, DAs and members of the police department.

programme.title: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
programme.desc: The team works to unravel a sex trafficking operation with ties to government offices, the police department and the Catholic church after one of their own is implicated in a cover-up.
When a famous mystery writer dies, Athena, Bobby and the 118 respond to the chaos caused by a citywide manhunt for buried treasure the author left behind.

The members of the 118 make calls to save a bridezilla at a disastrous wedding; Hen plays medical detective when her mother falls ill; Eddie and Christopher receive a visit from Carla; Athena uncovers a secret Bobby has been hiding.
Athena and the 118 are on high alert when a sniper is targeting members of the LAFD; Maddie makes a life decision.

A series of ransomware threats leads to emergencies for the 118, including a helicopter crash at a hospital and an air traffic control tower system failure; the case of the realtor serial rapist goes to trial.
The 118 springs into action when a citywide blackout and a record heat wave causes mayhem in Los Angeles; Chimney confides in Hen about Maddie's condition; Athena's worst nightmare comes true.

As the citywide blackout continues to cause mayhem in Los Angeles, Athena races to save her family from a tragedy; Eddie must make a difficult choice about his future; Maddie makes a life-changing decision.

A truck crashes into a high school homecoming parade; Athena and Michael try to help Harry in the aftermath of his kidnapping; May is intimidated by a returning call center legend; Bobby gives a devastated Chimney advice regarding Maddie.
A man over-exerts himself exercising; a groundskeeper is cut by his chainsaw; an explosion occurs at a retirement community; May gets an emergency call from a suicidal teen.
Responding to a fire at a prison, Bobby and the 118 find themselves trapped in a deadly riot.

A man claims he was carjacked, shot and buried alive; a homeowner thinks her roommate is a ghost; Hen receives a visit from the past; Athena and family are concerned that Harry is still haunted by visions of Jeffrey.
Bobby and the 118 race to save lives after an explosion rocks the hospital where Dr. David Hale is performing surgery; Michael makes a life-changing decision.

An abandoned oil well erupts and causes a massive sinkhole in downtown LA; Athena investigates a 30-year-old cold case involving a casino robbery; Buck fears his relationship with Taylor might be ending.
